tool_description: Analyse the content of an Email Address and check if it is valid or not. Email API can recode the Email Address if any common error or misspelling is found. The API can also check for invalid or fake DNS. [This API is under maintenance and is not working properly]
name: Email
title: Email

api_list.name: analysis
api_list.description: Analyse, validate and parse the content of a given Email Address
